content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

School debate (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: On what point do the two debaters agree?

choices.label: Public manners need to be taught to everyone.
Transportation systems face different kinds of public demands now.
Children should not use Silver Seats.
The Silver Seats system functioned well until a few years ago.

content.answer: Public manners need to be taught to everyone.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
